Boolean.Name: GevDeviceModeIsBigEndian
Boolean.DisplayName: Gev device mode is big endian

Enumeration.Name: GevDeviceModeCharacterSet
Enumeration.ToolTip: Character set used by all the strings of the bootstrap registers.
Enumeration.Description: Character set used by all the strings of the bootstrap registers.

Integer.Name: GevInterfaceSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects which physical network interface to control.
Integer.Description: Selects which physical network interface to control.

Integer.Name: GevMACAddress
Integer.ToolTip: MAC address of the network interface.
Integer.Description: MAC address of the network interface.

Enumeration.Name: GevSupportedOptionSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the GEV option to interrogate for existing support.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the GEV option to interrogate for existing support.

EnumEntry.Name: UserDefinedName
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates if the Userdefined name register is supported
EnumEntry.Description: Indicates if the Userdefined name register is supported

EnumEntry.Name: SerialNumber
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates if the Serial number register is supported
EnumEntry.Description: Indicates if the Serial number register is supported

EnumEntry.Name: HeartbeatDisable
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates if the Heartbeat can be disabled
EnumEntry.Description: Indicates if the Heartbeat can be disabled

EnumEntry.Name: LinkSpeed
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates if the Link Speed registers are supported
EnumEntry.Description: Indicates if the Link Speed registers are supported

EnumEntry.Name: CCPApplicationSocket
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates if the CCP Application Port and IP address registers are supported.
EnumEntry.Description: Indicates if the CCP Application Port and IP address registers are supported.

EnumEntry.Name: ManifestTable
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates if the Manifest Table is supported.
EnumEntry.Description: Indicates if the Manifest Table is supported.

EnumEntry.Name: TestData
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates if the test packet is filled with data from the LFSR generator.
EnumEntry.Description: Indicates if the test packet is filled with data from the LFSR generator.

EnumEntry.Name: DiscoveryAckDelay
EnumEntry.ToolTip: When Discovery ACK Delay register is supported, this bit indicates that the application can write it. If this bit is 0, the register is read-only.
EnumEntry.Description: When Discovery ACK Delay register is supported, this bit indicates that the application can write it. If this bit is 0, the register is read-only

EnumEntry.Name: DiscoveryAckDelayWritable
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates if the Discovery ACK Delay register is supported
EnumEntry.Description: Indicates if the Discovery ACK Delay register is supported

EnumEntry.Name: ExtendedStatusCodes
EnumEntry.ToolTip: It indicates if the generation of extended status codes is supported.
EnumEntry.Description: It indicates if the generation of extended status codes is supported.

EnumEntry.Name: PrimaryApplicationSwitchover
EnumEntry.ToolTip: It indicates if the authenticate primary application switchover requests are supported.
EnumEntry.Description: It indicates if the authenticate primary application switchover requests are supported.

EnumEntry.Name: Action
EnumEntry.ToolTip: It indicates if Actions are supported
EnumEntry.Description: It indicates if ACTION_CMD and ACTION_ACK are supported.

EnumEntry.Name: PendingAck
EnumEntry.ToolTip: It indicates if the generation of PENDING_ACK is supported.
EnumEntry.Description: It indicates if the generation of PENDING_ACK is supported.

EnumEntry.Name: EventData
EnumEntry.ToolTip: It indicates if the EVENTDATA_CMD and EVENTDATA_ACK are supported.
EnumEntry.Description: It indicates if the EVENTDATA_CMD and EVENTDATA_ACK are supported.

EnumEntry.Name: Event
EnumEntry.ToolTip: It indicates if the EVENT_CMD and EVENT_ACK are supported.
EnumEntry.Description: It indicates if the EVENT_CMD and EVENT_ACK are supported.

EnumEntry.Name: PacketResend
EnumEntry.ToolTip: It indicates if the PACKETRESEND_CMD is supported.
EnumEntry.Description: It indicates if the PACKETRESEND_CMD is supported.

EnumEntry.Name: WriteMem
EnumEntry.ToolTip: It indicates if the WRITEMEM_CMD and WRITEMEM_ACK are supported.
EnumEntry.Description: It indicates if the WRITEMEM_CMD and WRITEMEM_ACK are supported.

EnumEntry.Name: CommandsConcatenation
EnumEntry.ToolTip: It indicates if the Multiple operations in a single message are supported.
EnumEntry.Description: It indicates if the Multiple operations in a single message are supported.

EnumEntry.Name: IPConfigurationLLA
EnumEntry.ToolTip: It indicates if Link Local Address IP configuration scheme is supported
EnumEntry.Description: It indicates if Link Local Address IP configuration scheme is supported

EnumEntry.Name: IPConfigurationDHCP
EnumEntry.ToolTip: It indicates if DHCP IP configuration scheme is supported
EnumEntry.Description: It indicates if DHCP IP configuration scheme is supported

EnumEntry.Name: IPConfigurationPersistentIP
EnumEntry.ToolTip: It indicates if PersistentIP configuration scheme is supported
EnumEntry.Description: It indicates if PersistentIP configuration scheme is supported

EnumEntry.Name: StreamChannelSourceSocket
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates the SCSP register (stream channel source port) is available
EnumEntry.Description: Indicates the SCSP register (stream channel source port) is available

EnumEntry.Name: MessageChannelSourceSocket
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Indicates the MCSP register (message channel source port) is available
EnumEntry.Description: Indicates the MCSP register (message channel source port) is available

EnumEntry.Name: StreamChannel0BigAndLittleEndian
EnumEntry.DisplayName: Stream channel 0 big and little endian

Boolean.Name: GevSupportedOption
Boolean.ToolTip: Returns if the selected GEV option is supported.
Boolean.Description: Returns if the selected GEV option is supported.

Boolean.Name: GevCurrentIPConfigurationLLA
Boolean.ToolTip: Indicates if Link Local Address IP configuration scheme is activated on the given network interface.
Boolean.Description: Indicates if Link Local Address IP configuration scheme is activated on the given network interface.

Boolean.Name: GevCurrentIPConfigurationDHCP
Boolean.ToolTip: Indicates if DHCP IP configuration scheme is activated on the given network interface.
Boolean.Description: Indicates if DHCP IP configuration scheme is activated on the given network interface.

Boolean.Name: GevCurrentIPConfigurationPersistentIP
Boolean.ToolTip: Indicates if PersistentIP configuration scheme is activated on the given network interface.
Boolean.Description: Indicates if PersistentIP configuration scheme is activated on the given network interface.
Boolean.DisplayName: Gev current IP configuration persistent IP

Integer.Name: GevCurrentIPAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Reports the IP address for the given network interface.
Integer.Description: Reports the IP address for the given network interface.

Integer.Name: GevCurrentSubnetMask
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the subnet mask of the given interface.
Integer.Description: Provides the subnet mask of the given interface.

Integer.Name: GevCurrentDefaultGateway
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the default gateway IP address to be used on the given network interface.
Integer.Description: Indicates the default gateway IP address to be used on the given network interface.

StringReg.Name: GevFirstURL
StringReg.ToolTip: Indicates the first URL to the XML device description file.
StringReg.Description: Indicates the first URL to the XML device description file. The First URL is used as the first choice by the application to retrieve the XML device description file.

StringReg.Name: GevSecondURL
StringReg.ToolTip: Indicates the second URL to the XML device description file.
StringReg.Description: Indicates the second URL to the XML device description file. This URL is an alternative if the application was unsuccessful to retrieve the device description file using the first URL.

Integer.Name: GevNumberOfInterfaces
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of physical network interfaces supported by this device.
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of physical network interfaces supported by this device.

Integer.Name: GevPersistentIPAddress
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the Persistent IP address for this network interface.
Integer.Description: Indicates the Persistent IP address for this network interface. It is only used when the device boots with the Persistent IP configuration scheme.

Integer.Name: GevPersistentSubnetMask
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the Persistent subnet mask associated with the Persistent IP address on this network interface.
Integer.Description: Indicates the Persistent subnet mask associated with the Persistent IP address on this network interface. It is only used when the device boots with the Persistent IP configuration scheme.

Integer.Name: GevPersistentDefaultGateway
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the persistent default gateway for this network interface.
Integer.Description: Indicates the persistent default gateway for this network interface. It is only used when the device boots with the Persistent IP configuration scheme.

Integer.Name: GevLinkSpeed
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the speed of transmission negotiated by the given network interface.
Integer.Description: Indicates the speed of transmission negotiated by the given network interface.

Integer.Name: GevMessageChannelCount
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of message channels supported by this device.
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of message channels supported by this device.

Integer.Name: GevStreamChannelCount
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of stream channels supported by this device.
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of stream channels supported by this device.

Integer.Name: GevHeartbeatTimeout
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the current heartbeat timeout in milliseconds.
Integer.Description: Indicates the current heartbeat timeout in milliseconds.

Integer.Name: GevTimestampTickFrequency
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of timestamp ticks during 1 second (frequency in Hz).
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of timestamp ticks during 1 second (frequency in Hz).

IntSwissKnife.Name: GevTimestampTickFrequencyValue
IntSwissKnife.ToolTip: Combines timestamp values to one value.

Command.Name: GevTimestampControlLatch
Command.ToolTip: Latches current timestamp counter into GevTimestampValue.
Command.Description: Latches current timestamp counter into GevTimestampValue.

Integer.Name: GevTimestampValue
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the latched 64-bit value of the timestamp counter.
Integer.Description: Returns the latched 64-bit value of the timestamp counter.

Enumeration.Name: GevCCP
Enumeration.ToolTip: Controls the device access privilege of an application.
Enumeration.Description: Controls the device access privilege of an application.

Integer.Name: GevMCPHostPort
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the port to which the device must send messages.
Integer.Description: Indicates the port to which the device must send messages. Setting this value to 0 closes the message channel.

Integer.Name: GevMCDA
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the destination IP address for the message channel.
Integer.Description: Indicates the destination IP address for the message channel.

Integer.Name: GevMCTT
Integer.ToolTip: Provides the transmission timeout value in milliseconds.
Integer.Description: Provides the transmission timeout value in milliseconds.

Integer.Name: GevMCRC
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the number of retransmissions allowed when a message channel message times out.
Integer.Description: Indicates the number of retransmissions allowed when a message channel message times out.

Integer.Name: GevMCSP
Integer.ToolTip: This feature indicates the source port for the message channel.
Integer.Description: This feature indicates the source port for the message channel.

Integer.Name: GevStreamChannelSelector
Integer.ToolTip: Selects the stream channel to control.
Integer.Description: Selects the stream channel to control.

Integer.Name: GevSCPInterfaceIndex
Integer.ToolTip: Index of network interface to use (from 0 to 3).
Integer.Description: Index of network interface to use (from 0 to 3).

Integer.Name: GevSCPHostPort
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the port to which the device must send data stream.
Integer.Description: Indicates the port to which the device must send data stream. Setting this value to 0 closes the stream channel.

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSFireTestPacket
Boolean.Description: Sends a test packet. When this feature is set, the device will fire one test packet.

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSDoNotFragment
Boolean.ToolTip: The state of this feature is copied into the "do not fragment" bit of IP header of each stream packet.
Boolean.Description: The state of this feature is copied into the "do not fragment" bit of IP header of each stream packet. It can be used by the application to prevent IP fragmentation of packets on the stream channel.

Boolean.Name: GevSCPSBigEndian
Boolean.ToolTip: Endianess of multi-byte pixel data for this stream.
Boolean.Description: Endianess of multi-byte pixel data for this stream.

Integer.Name: GevSCPSPacketSize
Integer.ToolTip: Specifies the stream packet size in bytes to send on this channel.
Integer.Description: Specifies the stream packet size in bytes to send on this channel.

Integer.Name: GevSCPD
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the delay (in timestamp counter unit) to insert between each packet for this stream channel.
Integer.Description: Indicates the delay (in timestamp counter unit) to insert between each packet for this stream channel. This can be used as a crude flow-control mechanism if the application or the network infrastructure cannot keep up with the packets coming from the device.

Integer.Name: GevSCDA
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the destination IP address for this stream channel.
Integer.Description: Indicates the destination IP address for this stream channel.

Integer.Name: GevSCSP
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates the source port of the stream channel.
Integer.Description: Indicates the source port of the stream channel.

StructEntry.Name: GevDeviceModeCharacterSetReg
StructEntry.ToolTip: Register containing the character set value

IntSwissKnife.Name: GevInterfaceBaseAddress
IntSwissKnife.ToolTip: Base address for interface registers of selected index.

IntSwissKnife.Name: PersistentIPEnabled
IntSwissKnife.ToolTip: Checks whether persistent IP is enabled.

StructEntry.Name: GevSCPSDoNotFragmentReg
StructEntry.ToolTip: Bootstrap SCPS register do not fragment.

StructEntry.Name: GevSCPSFireTestPacketReg
StructEntry.ToolTip: Bootstrap SCPS register fire test packet.

Category.Name: PtpControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that contains the features related to the Precision Time Protocol (PTP) of the device.
Category.Description: Category that contains the features related to the Precision Time Protocol (PTP) of the device.

Enumeration.Name: GevIEEE1588Status
Enumeration.ToolTip: Returns the current state of the PTP clock.
Enumeration.Description: Returns the current state of the PTP clock.

Enumeration.Name: GevIEEE1588ClockAccuracy
Enumeration.ToolTip: Indicates the expected accuracy of the device PTP clock when it is the grandmaster, or in the event it becomes the grandmaster.
Enumeration.Description: Indicates the expected accuracy of the device PTP clock when it is the grandmaster, or in the event it becomes the grandmaster.

Enumeration.Name: PtpClockAccuracy
Enumeration.ToolTip: Indicates the expected accuracy of the device PTP clock when it is the grandmaster, or in the event it becomes the grandmaster.
Enumeration.Description: Indicates the expected accuracy of the device PTP clock when it is the grandmaster, or in the event it becomes the grandmaster.

Command.Name: PtpDataSetLatch
Command.ToolTip: Latches the current values from the device's PTP clock data set.
Command.Description: Latches the current values from the device's PTP clock data set.

Enumeration.Name: PtpStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: Returns the latched state of the PTP clock.
Enumeration.Description: Returns the latched state of the PTP clock.

Enumeration.Name: PtpServoStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: Returns the latched state of the clock servo.
Enumeration.Description: Returns the latched state of the clock servo.

Integer.Name: PtpOffsetFromMaster
Integer.ToolTip: Return the latched offset from the PTP master clock in nanoseconds.
Integer.Description: Return the latched offset from the PTP master clock in nanoseconds.

Integer.Name: PtpMeanPropagationDelay
Integer.ToolTip: Returns the latched mean propagation delay from the current PTP master clock in nanoseconds.
Integer.Description: Returns the latched mean propagation delay from the current PTP master clock in nanoseconds.

Integer.Name: PtpClockID
Integer.ToolTip: Return the latched clock ID of the PTP device.
Integer.Description: Return the latched clock ID of the PTP device.

Integer.Name: PtpParentClockID
Integer.ToolTip: Return the latched parent clock ID of the PTP device.
Integer.Description: Return the latched parent clock ID of the PTP device.

Integer.Name: PtpGrandmasterClockID
Integer.ToolTip: Return the latched grandmaster clock ID of the PTP device.
Integer.Description: Return the latched grandmaster clock ID of the PTP device.

Category.Name: ActionControl
Category.Description: Category that contains the Action control features.

Integer.Name: ActionDeviceKey
Integer.Description: Provides the device key that allows the device to check the validity of action commands.

Integer.Name: ActionQueueSize
Integer.Description: Indicates the size of the scheduled action commands queue.

Integer.Name: ActionSelector
Integer.Description: Selects to which Action Signal further Action settings apply.

Integer.Name: ActionGroupMask
Integer.Description: Provides the mask that the device will use to validate the action on reception of the action protocol message.

Integer.Name: ActionGroupKey
Integer.Description: Provides the key that the device will use to validate the action on reception of the action protocol message.

Category.Name: SensorConfigControl
Category.Description: Category for ROIC configuration settings.

Category.Name: FooterControl
Category.Description: Category that contains the footer control features.

Category.Name: ImageProcessingControl
Category.Description: Category that contains the pixel Correction control features.

Category.Name: ImageCorrectionControl
Category.Description: Image correction control

Category.Name: SourceControl
Category.Description: Source control

Enumeration.Name: ImageCorrectionNucCorrection
Enumeration.ToolTip: Enables FPN and PRNU stages of pixel correction
Enumeration.Description: Enables FPN and PRNU stages of pixel correction

Enumeration.Name: ImageCorrectionBprCorrection
Enumeration.ToolTip: Enables Bad Pixel replacement
Enumeration.Description: Enables Bad Pixel replacement

Enumeration.Name: ImageCorrectionLensCorrection
Enumeration.ToolTip: Enables lens correction
Enumeration.Description: Enables lens correction

Enumeration.Name: XIEStrength
Enumeration.ToolTip: XIE Strength
Enumeration.Description: Sets the strength of image filter

Integer.Name: TLParamsLocked
Integer.ToolTip: Indicates whether a live grab is under way

Category.Name: PixelReplacementControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for the user defined bad pixel replacement control.
Category.Description: Category that contains camera uptime and camera lifetime.

Integer.Name: PixelReplacementOffsetX
Integer.Description: X offset of the user defined bad pixel

Integer.Name: PixelReplacementOffsetY
Integer.Description: Y offset of the user defined bad pixel

Integer.Name: PixelReplacementCount
Integer.Description: User defined bad pixel count

Category.Name: AcquisitionControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for the acquisition and trigger control features.
Category.Description: Category for the acquisition and trigger control features.

Command.Name: AcquisitionStart
Command.ToolTip: Acquisition is started when '1' is written
Command.Description: Acquisition is started when '1' is written

Command.Name: AcquisitionStop
Command.ToolTip: Acquisition is stopped when '1' is written
Command.Description: Acquisition is stopped when '1' is written

Enumeration.Name: AcquisitionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Sets the acquisition mode of the device.
Enumeration.Description: Sets the acquisition mode of the device. It defines mainly the number of frames to capture during an acquisition and the way the acquisition stops.

Integer.Name: AcquisitionFrameTime
Integer.ToolTip: Frame time period in us

Integer.Name: TestPatternShift
Integer.ToolTip: Number of bits the tests patteren shift to the rigth

Enumeration.Name: AutoCorrectionMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Continuous or manual mode for the shutter based auto correction module
Enumeration.Description: Continuous or manual mode for the shutter based auto correction module

Float.Name: AutoCorrectionDeltaTemperature
Float.ToolTip: Sensor temperature difference to trigger auto correction
Float.Description: Sensor temperature difference to trigger auto correction

Integer.Name: AutoCorrectionDeltaTime
Integer.ToolTip: Max time difference since last correction to trigger auto correction (ms)
Integer.Description: Max time difference since last correction to trigger auto correction (ms)

Command.Name: AutoCorrectionUpdate
Command.ToolTip: Auto correction starts when '1' is written
Command.Description: Auto correction starts when '1' is written

Enumeration.Name: AutoCorrectionStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: Status of the auto correction module
Enumeration.Description: Status of the auto correction module

Command.Name: ShutterOpen
Command.ToolTip: Command | Read = 1 --> Shutter is in open position
Command.Description: Command | Read = 1 --> Shutter is in open position

Command.Name: ShutterClose
Command.ToolTip: Command | Read = 1 --> Shutter is in closed position
Command.Description: Command | Read = 1 --> Shutter is in closed position

Integer.Name: ShutterTime
Integer.ToolTip: Time of last shutter transition (ms)
Integer.Description: Time of last shutter transition (ms)

Category.Name: LayerProcessingControl
Category.Description: Category that contains layer processing features.

Category.Name: CrosshairControl
Category.Description: Crosshair control

Integer.Name: CrosshairOpacity
Integer.Description: Control the opacity of the crosshair

Integer.Name: CrosshairOffsetX
Integer.Description: Center of the crosshair

Integer.Name: CrosshairOffsetY
Integer.Description: Center of the crosshair

Integer.Name: CrosshairWidth
Integer.Description: Whidth of the center rectangle

Integer.Name: CrosshairHeight
Integer.Description: Heigth of the center rectangle

Integer.Name: OverlayTextOpacity
Integer.ToolTip: Overlay text opacity
Integer.Description: Sets the opacity of overlay text

Integer.Name: OverlayTextColor
Integer.ToolTip: Overlay text color
Integer.Description: Sets the color of overlay text

Integer.Name: OverlayTextBackColor
Integer.ToolTip: Overlay text background color
Integer.Description: Sets the background color of overlay text

Boolean.Name: OverlayTextBackColorEnable
Boolean.Description: Enables the background color of overlay text

Integer.Name: OverlayTextOffsetX
Integer.ToolTip: Overlay text OffsetX
Integer.Description: Sets the OffsetX of overlay text

Integer.Name: OverlayTextOffsetY
Integer.ToolTip: Overlay text OffsetY
Integer.Description: Sets the OffsetY of overlay text

Enumeration.Name: ThermographyMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Temperature linearization enable.
Enumeration.Description: Temperature linearization enable.

Category.Name: RadiometryControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that collects the radiometry features.
Category.Description: Category that collects the radiometry features.

Category.Name: TemperatureControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that collects the features for temperature linearized output.
Category.Description: Category that collects the features for temperature linearized output.

Float.Name: ThermographyTemperatureMinimalTemperature
Float.ToolTip: Lowest temperature for which the camera is calibrated in degrees Kelvin (K).
Float.Description: Lowest temperature for which the camera is calibrated in degrees Kelvin (K).

Float.Name: ThermographyTemperatureMaximalTemperature
Float.ToolTip: Highest temperature for which the camera is calibrated in degrees Kelvin (K).
Float.Description: Highest temperature for which the camera is calibrated in degrees Kelvin (K).

Float.Name: ThermographyTemperatureSelectionMinimalTemperature
Float.ToolTip: User selection lowest temperature in degrees Kelvin (K).
Float.Description: User selection lowest temperature in degrees Kelvin (K). Only taken into account in the temperature mode.

Float.Name: ThermographyTemperatureSelectionMaximalTemperature
Float.ToolTip: User selection highest temperature in degrees Kelvin (K).
Float.Description: User selection highest temperature in degrees Kelvin (K). Only taken into account in the temperature mode.

Float.Name: ThermographyTemperatureEmissivity
Float.Description: Surface emissivity. Only taken into account in the temperature mode.

Float.Name: ThermographyTemperatureAmbientTemperature
Float.Description: Ambient temperature in degrees Kelvin (K). Only taken into account in the temperature mode.

Float.Name: ThermographyTemperatureAtmosphereTransmission
Float.Description: Atmosphere transmission. Only taken into account in the temperature mode.

Float.Name: ThermographyTemperatureAtmosphereTemperature
Float.Description: Atmosphere temperature in degrees Kelvin (K). Only taken into account in the temperature mode.

Float.Name: ThermographyTemperatureWindowTransmission
Float.Description: Window transmission. Only taken into account in the temperature mode.

Float.Name: ThermographyTemperatureWindowTemperature
Float.Description: Window temperature in degrees Kelvin (K). Only taken into account in the temperature mode.

Float.Name: ThermographyTemperatureWindowReflection
Float.Description: Window reflection. Only taken into account in the temperature mode.

Float.Name: ThermographyTemperatureWindowReflectedTemperature
Float.ToolTip: Window reflected temperature in degrees Kelvin (K).
Float.Description: Window reflected temperature in degrees Kelvin (K). Only taken into account in the temperature mode.

Category.Name: ModelControl
Category.ToolTip: Category that accomodates all model related invisible features.
Category.Description: Category that accomodates all model related invisible features.

Category.Name: DigitalOutputControl
Category.Description: Category that controls the digital output.

Category.Name: TimerControl
Category.Description: Category that contains camera uptime and camera lifetime.

Integer.Name: TimerUpTime
Integer.Description: Up time in seconds since boot time

Integer.Name: TimerLifeTime
Integer.Description: Life time in seconds since factory

Category.Name: FileAccessControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for File Access control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the File Access control features.

Enumeration.Name: FileSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the target file.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the target file in the device.

EnumEntry.Name: RecoveryBitstream
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Recovery bitstream.
EnumEntry.Description: Recovery bitstream. Maximum size: 12.288 MB.

EnumEntry.Name: RecoveryApplication
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Recovery application.
EnumEntry.Description: Recovery application. Maximum size: 2.048 MB.

EnumEntry.Name: RecoveryXml
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Recovery XML.
EnumEntry.Description: Recovery XML file. Maximum size: 256 KB.

EnumEntry.Name: UpgradeBitstream

EnumEntry.Description: Upgrade bitstream. Maximum size: 12.288 MB.

EnumEntry.Name: UpgradeApplication
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Upgrade application.
EnumEntry.Description: Upgrade application. Maximum size: 2.048 MB.

EnumEntry.Name: UpgradeXML
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Upgrade XML file.
EnumEntry.Description: Upgrade XML file. Maximum size: 256 KB.

EnumEntry.Name: SensorModuleRecoveryImage
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sensor module recovery image
EnumEntry.Description: Sensor module recovery image. Maximum size: ... kB.

EnumEntry.Name: SensorModuleUpgradeImage
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sensor module upgrade image
EnumEntry.Description: Sensor module upgrade image. Maximum size: ... kB.

EnumEntry.Name: SensorModuleApplicationUpgradeImage
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Sensor module application upgrade image
EnumEntry.Description: Sensor module application upgrade image. Maximum size: ... kB.

EnumEntry.Name: CorrectionName
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Correction name file not to be uploaded directly.
EnumEntry.Description: Correction name that will be stored in the selected slot at Calibration Set control (not to be uploaded directly).

EnumEntry.Name: CorrectionSettings
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Correction settings file not to be uploaded directly.
EnumEntry.Description: Correction settings file that will be stored in the selected slot at Calibration Set control (not to be uploaded directly).

EnumEntry.Name: CorrectionGain
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Correction gain file not to be uploaded directly.
EnumEntry.Description: Correction gain file that will be stored in the selected slot at Calibration Set control (not to be uploaded directly).

EnumEntry.Name: CorrectionOffset
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Correction offset file not to be uploaded directly.
EnumEntry.Description: Correction offset file that will be stored in the selected slot at Calibration Set control (not to be uploaded directly).

EnumEntry.Name: CorrectionBadPixels
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Correction bad pixels file not to be uploaded directly.
EnumEntry.Description: Correction bad pixels file that will be stored in the selected slot at Calibration Set control (not to be uploaded directly).

EnumEntry.Name: CorrectionThermography
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Correction thermography file not to be uploaded directly.
EnumEntry.Description: Correction thermography file that will be stored in the selected slot at Calibration Set control (not to be uploaded directly).

EnumEntry.Name: UserFile1
EnumEntry.ToolTip: User defined file 1
EnumEntry.Description: User defined file 1. Maximum size: 256 KB.

Enumeration.Name: FileOpenMode
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the access mode in which a file is opened.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the access mode in which a file is opened in the device.

EnumEntry.Name: Read
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Read-only open mode.
EnumEntry.Description: This mode selects read-only open mode.

EnumEntry.Name: Write
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Write-only open mode.
EnumEntry.Description: This mode selects write-only open mode.

Enumeration.Name: FileOperationSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the target operation for the selected file.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the target operation for the selected file in the device.

EnumEntry.Name: Open
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Opens the file selected by FileSelector.
EnumEntry.Description: Opens the file selected by FileSelector in the device. The access mode in which the file is opened is selected by FileOpenMode.

EnumEntry.Name: Close
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Closes the file selected by FileSelector.
EnumEntry.Description: Closes the file selected by FileSelector in the device.

EnumEntry.Name: Read
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Reads FileAccessLength bytes from the device storage.
EnumEntry.Description: Reads FileAccessLength bytes from the device storage at the file relative offset FileAccessOffset into FileAccessBuffer.

EnumEntry.Name: Write
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Writes FileAccessLength bytes taken from the FileAccessBuffer.
EnumEntry.Description: Writes FileAccessLength bytes taken from the FileAccessBuffer into the device storage at the file relative offset FileAccessOffset.

Command.Name: FileOperationExecute
Command.ToolTip: Executes the selected operation on the selected file.
Command.Description: Executes the operation selected by FileOperationSelector on the selected file.

Enumeration.Name: FileOperationStatus
Enumeration.ToolTip: Represents the file operation execution status.
Enumeration.Description: Represents the file operation execution status.

EnumEntry.Name: Success
EnumEntry.ToolTip: File operation was successful.
EnumEntry.Description: Returned upon execution of a successful file operation.

EnumEntry.Name: Failure
EnumEntry.ToolTip: File operation failed.
EnumEntry.Description: Returned upon a failed file operation.

EnumEntry.Name: Busy
EnumEntry.ToolTip: File operation under execution.
EnumEntry.Description: Returned while executing a file operation.

Integer.Name: FileOperationResult
Integer.ToolTip: Represents the file operation result.
Integer.Description: Represents the file operation result.

Integer.Name: FileSize
Integer.ToolTip: Represents the size of the selected file.
Integer.Description: Represents the size of the selected file in bytes.

Integer.Name: FileAccessOffset
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the Offset of the mapping.
Integer.Description: Controls the Offset of the mapping between the device file storage and the FileAccessBuffer.

Integer.Name: FileAccessLength
Integer.ToolTip: Controls the Length of the mapping.
Integer.Description: Controls the Length of the mapping between the device file storage and the FileAccessBuffer.

StringReg.Name: FileAccessBuffer
StringReg.ToolTip: Defines the intermediate file access buffer.
StringReg.Description: Defines the intermediate access buffer that allows the exchange of data between the device file storage and the application.

IntReg.Name: FileAccessMultipleCommands
IntReg.ToolTip: Allows the device to expect receiving several commands.
IntReg.Description: Allows the device to know if it has to expect receiving several commands in a row.

Category.Name: UserSetControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for User Set control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the User Set control features.

Enumeration.Name: UserSetSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the feature User Set to load or save.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the feature User Set to load, save or configure.

EnumEntry.Name: FactoryDefault
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Factory default user set.
EnumEntry.Description: Factory default user set.

Command.Name: UserSetLoad
Command.ToolTip: Loads the User Set and makes it active.
Command.Description: Loads the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the device and makes it active.

Command.Name: UserSetSave
Command.ToolTip: Saves the User Set to storage.
Command.Description: Save the User Set specified by UserSetSelector to the non-volatile memory of the device.

Command.Name: UserSetClear
Command.ToolTip: Clears the User Set from storage.
Command.Description: Clears the User Set specified by UserSetSelector from the device.

Enumeration.Name: UserSetDefault
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the User Set to load when the device is reset.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the feature User Set to load and make active by default when the device is reset.

EnumEntry.Name: FactoryDefault
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Factory default user set.
EnumEntry.Description: Factory default user set.

Enumeration.Name: UserSetSlotInfo
Enumeration.ToolTip: Informs of the User Set availability.
Enumeration.Description: Informs of the selected User Set availability. If it is not empty, it will be necessary to clear it before saving new data on it.

EnumEntry.Name: Occupied
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The User Set has data.
EnumEntry.Description: The selected User Set contains stored settings.

EnumEntry.Name: Empty
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The User Set is empty.
EnumEntry.Description: The selected User Set contains no data.

Enumeration.Name: UserSetCurrent
Enumeration.ToolTip: Informs of the active User Set.
Enumeration.Description: Informs of the active User Set.

EnumEntry.Name: FactoryDefault
EnumEntry.ToolTip: Factory default user set.
EnumEntry.Description: Factory default user set.

Category.Name: CalibrationSetControl
Category.ToolTip: Category for Calibration Set control features.
Category.Description: Category that contains the Calibration Pack Set control features.

Enumeration.Name: ImageCorrectionSourceSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the image correction slot to use.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the image correction slot to use.

Enumeration.Name: ImageCorrectionSourceContent
Enumeration.Description: Calibration source content

StringReg.Name: ImageCorrectionSourceUserName
StringReg.ToolTip: User name associated with the calibration pack.

Enumeration.Name: CalibrationSetSelector
Enumeration.ToolTip: Selects the calibration set to store or clear.
Enumeration.Description: Selects the calibration set to store (via File Access control) or clear.

Command.Name: CalibrationSetClear
Command.ToolTip: Clears the selected calibration set from storage.
Command.Description: Clears the calibration set specified by CalibrationSetSelector located at the non-volatile memory of the device.

Enumeration.Name: CalibrationSetSlotInfo
Enumeration.ToolTip: Informs of the slot availability.
Enumeration.Description: Informs of the selected slot availability. If it is not free, it will be necessary to clear it before storing a new correction or calibration on it.

EnumEntry.Name: Occupied
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The slot has data.
EnumEntry.Description: The selected slot contains calibration data.

EnumEntry.Name: Empty
EnumEntry.ToolTip: The slot is empty.
EnumEntry.Description: The selected slot is empty.
